name: Castlevania: Chorus of Mysteries
description:
his is a hack of the original Castlevania for NES that optomon and I have been working on for over a year. Optomon has done all the coding, music, and some level design, and I’ve done all the graphics, some level design, and the map. So what’s changed?

New GFX  
New levels  
New level paths  
New map  
New sub-weapon  
New music  
Music on the title screen  
New enemies  
New bosses
